text_block_list.text:
The Horse Girls will be running the Selection Race. 
I wonder what kind of Horse Girl I will meet, thus 
I’m heading to the venue with expectations…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
It’s okay… I did my training properly. I can 
definitely win. I’ll win. With my legs…

I saw that Gold City was scheduled to run. She 
was encouraging herself and seemed nervous…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
He!? Ha? What’s all of a sudden… Who are you? 
Those clothes… A trainer of Tracen Academy?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I’m sorry, but if you want to talk to me, I’ll do it after the 
Selection Race. Other than that, pass.
After treating me coldly, Gold City left the place…

Anyway, we’re finally in the middle of the Selection Race that 
started, and when I looked at the next race entry tableー

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: Woah, beautiful…! Look at that girl…! Is she the rumored!?

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Um… A-Are you by any chance…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Yes, do you mean me?

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I knew it! You’re the model City-chan, right? I’ve seen you in 
magazines before, but you’re really beautiful~…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Ah-… Thank you so much.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Well, if there is such a flower appearing, I will look forward to 
the race~. Good luck, City-chan!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Yes. I will do my best to make you charmed by my run.
After the such a commotion, the race startedー

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Gold City, can’t rise from behind! Last 400m! Is this too tough!?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Heh… heh… don’t screw around…! I am! I can still go…!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: ーGoal!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Heh, heh… heh… 5th place, huh… damn it.

Gold City had a great run at the end, unfortunately, 
she could not leave a good result…

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, there was something shining on the last leg, but overall it 
was mediocre, just another level. Well, it’s often that 
model-work and racing do not go up together.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
More importantly her running form! The tail flower's 
chestnut hair fluttering in the wind, it was beautiful. 
Well, I saw something good!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Tch.

Gold City walked away in silence, that face that seemed to be 
filled with regret, left a little impression on me…

While I was walking along the riverbed while thinking back about 
the Selection Race at the dusk of that dayー

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Hey, City, time-time~!! Seriously bad~!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Heh… heh… What is it, Jordan, are you already tired?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
No, I was hurt too… But City, aren’t your legs pretty tired 
too? You had a race too, you shouldn’t overdo it~.

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text: …City, Jordan-san is right.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Wow, you’re here!? You scared me~…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Manager… What is it, you were watching?

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
If you do more, it will resonate with tomorrow’s work. What will 
you do if you fall and get injured with such a flimsy run?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Yes-yes. I won’t hurt your tools.

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text: City… Please understand. I’m doing it for your sake.

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
I’ve chosen the one that suits your image best for 
the next job. Cool and composed, and gorgeousー

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: … I’m doing my job properly!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You’ve taken care of me, and I’m grateful to you. Because that is 
my job, I won’t say that I’m quitting my model-work right now.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But, I want to run and train! I tell you every 
time just “don’t get in the way” right!?

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
…From the beginning I said “I’m against it”. City, 
you don’t really know what you’re worth…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Ha!? Value!? That’s not my valueー

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Shoot!! I’m really craving some stew~!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Huh?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Because~, you keep saying City-City all the time. Don’t 
City and stew sound kind of similar? It made me hungry~.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: With that, manager-san. Can we go to get some food~?

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
…I understand. Then, I have another meeting to prepare for 
tomorrow… City, be careful not to get injured.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
…She’s gone? Ha~, that was bad~. 
Manager-san is the same as ever~.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Sigh… Sorry, Jordan. You saved me, thank you.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! City honestly saying “Thank you”, hilarious✰

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Also, I’m serious about being hungry. 
Shall we go get dinner soon?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Sorry. I’m going to run a little more. Go ahead.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
For real~? I see~. Don’t overdo it, 
okay? Well then, see ya later~.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Alrighty Let’s do it.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: It’s not just about looking at me. I'm not an empty dollー

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Because I will become my own person…!

Sweaty and tense, she runs while basking in the sun, she was 
prettier than any Horse Girl I’ve ever seen…
